name: Learn to Read and Write Arabic For Beginners
Learn Arabic! Start Speaking Arabic Now!
detail: You will read and write some words from the first class. In each lesson you usually learn 2 letters, we will blend them making some words that don't have meaning, and through this fun activity you will be able to recognize the different shapes of the same letter.
